thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Eiffage sees further revenue growth in 2018

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Eiffage sees further revenue growth in 2018
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - French construction and civil engineering company Eiffage said on Wednesday it expects more growth in revenues this year, after reporting higher profits for 2017.
The groupâ€™s operating profit on ordinary activities increased by 8.3 percent to 1.73 billion euros ($2.1 billion) last year, while consolidated sales came in at 15 billion euros thanks to an upbeat fourth quarter.
It did not give a precise forecast for revenue growth this year. ($1 = 0.8187 euros) (Reporting by Piotr Lipinski in Gdynia; Editing by Susan Fenton)
